com.yahoo.gondola.core

Class MessageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.gondola.core.MessageHandler

  • public abstract class MessageHandler
extends Object
    The implementation methods in this class should not release the message. It is the responsibility of the caller to release the message after these methods return.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageHandler()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void appendEntryReply(Message message, int fromMemberId, int term, int mnIndex, boolean success)
      If success is true, matchIndex should be set to mnIndex.
      boolean appendEntryRequest(Message message, int fromMemberId, int term, int prevLogTerm, int prevLogIndex, int commitIndex, boolean isHeartbeat, int entryTerm, byte[] buffer, int bufferOffset, int bufferLen, boolean lastCommand)
      This method is called for every command that has been batched in this message.

      • appendEntryRequest

        public boolean appendEntryRequest(Message message,
                                  int fromMemberId,
                                  int term,
                                  int prevLogTerm,
                                  int prevLogIndex,
                                  int commitIndex,
                                  boolean isHeartbeat,
                                  int entryTerm,
                                  byte[] buffer,
                                  int bufferOffset,
                                  int bufferLen,
                                  boolean lastCommand)
                           throws Exception
        This method is called for every command that has been batched in this message. Do not reuse 'message' to create a reply since it will still be in use until all batches are handled.
        Parameters:
        lastCommand - is true if there are no more commands in the message.
        Returns:
        true to get the next batch (if any); false to stop getting more batches.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • appendEntryReply

        public void appendEntryReply(Message message,
                             int fromMemberId,
                             int term,
                             int mnIndex,
                             boolean success)
                      throws Exception
        If success is true, matchIndex should be set to mnIndex. If success is false, nextIndex should be set to mnIndex.
        Throws:
        Exception
